summary: The story of love and friendship on the harsh streets of 2014 Mallepa, a small corner in Asia.
cast: Hyde|Gackt|Leehom Wang|Tarô Yamamoto|Susumu Terajima|Zeny Kwok|Seiji Chihara|Chihara Junia|Yosh|Kanata Hongô|Ryo Ishibashi|Jack Kao|You Kurosaki|Anne Suzuki|James H. Thomas|Etsushi Toyokawa
title: Moon Child
